metadata.title: CVE-2015-2141 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The InvertibleRWFunction::CalculateInverse function in rw.cpp in libcrypt++5.6.2 does not properly blind private key operations for the Rabin-Williamsdigital signature algorithm, which allows remote attackers to obtainprivate keys via a timing attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcrypto++-utils - 5.6.1-6+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
libcrypto++9 - 5.6.1-6+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.1-6+deb8u1build0.14.04.1').
